article.headline: Longwood 77, James Madison 73
article.story: FARMVILLE, Va. (AP) -- Maurice Sumter had 27 points and Brandon Giles scored 12 of his career-high 21 in the second half as Longwood held on Saturday for a 77-73 victory over James Madison, the Lancers' first-ever win over the Dukes. Giles was perfect from beyond the arch, hitting five of Longwood's six 3-pointers. The lead changed nine times in the second half. Longwood (8-19) took the lead for good off Clayton Morgan's 3-pointer with 3:01 remaining and the Lancers went ahead by as many as six the rest of the way. Longwood outscored the Dukes 20-4 in the paint in the second half, and 30-18 for the game. Longwood jumped out to lead by as many as 10 before Colbey Santos' 3-pointer put James Madison (5-20) ahead 25-23 with 7:14 to go in the first half. The Lancers regained the lead, then Juwann James' layup with 4:30 left tied it again at 32 apiece. Longwood went up by four then James tied it again with 1:27 left in the half. Kyle Swanston hit a 3, then Morgan's jumper with 20 seconds left cut James Madison's lead to 39-38 at the break. Morgan had 14 points and nine rebounds for Longwood, and Lamar Barrett added 11. Daniel Freeman led the Dukes with 16 points. James had 15, Ray Barbosa and Swanston had 12 and David Cooper added 11.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
